DOC.brief_summary: The aim study compare effect prebiotics versus placebo blood concentration glucagon-like peptide-1 subject diabetes type 2 .
DOC.criteria: diabetes type 2 BMI 18,5 40 Not medicate insulin , GLP1 analogues DPP4 inhibitor Moderate intake alcohol Not excessive exercise Less 3 kg weight change last two month Intake le 30 g dietary fiber per day IBD IBS Coeliac disease Have use antibiotic within last two month Have use supplement prebiotics probiotic last two month Pregnancy
